ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Aerostreak, Grappler, Gunatix, Paralysis, Adrax, and Autofire stood just beyond the battle at the Ark. Paralysis was in command of the mission until the

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Aerostreak, Grappler, Gunatix, Paralysis, Adrax, and Autofire stood just 
beyond the battle at the Ark. Paralysis was in command of the mission until 
the arrival of Aracnia. He looked at his team. Aerostreak, Autofire, and 
Adrax would attack from above, Guantix, Grappler, and Himself would make a 
ground assult. 
    "Alright, you have your orders! Take down the Ark! And kill all 
Maximals!" Paralysis shouted as Adrax, Autofire, and Aerostreak took to the 
skys, fireing rockets, lasers, pulse shots, and lasers at the Ark. Paralysis, 
Grappler, and Guantix ran into the battlefeild, targeting Maximals and taking 
them down. Providing cover for there ally's.
